CWEs: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
CWE-676: Use of Potentially Dangerous Function
description: The function uses 'Math.random()' which is not cryptographically secure. It can lead to predictable randomness vulnerabilities. Also, the function uses 'Buffer.allocUnsafe(8)', which can potentially lead to the disclosure of sensitive information as it does not initialize the allocated memory.
